product.title: Love LoveGod
product.description: Love LoveGod is a two player brawler, where you win by sending flowers to the LoveGod, watching you from the top of the arena
product.history: This game was made with Unity, during the ENJAM 2016, an intern jam for ENJMIN students. We were two programmers on the project. It was my first time on Unity, and I made the character controller.

features.feature: You don't have to kill your opponent to win !
